page.title: 15ENTERTAINMENT IN KENDAL
page.content: The{Brewery Arts Centre}is the only one in South Lakeland.There are Jazz and Folk music festivals and book and craft fairs.The centre has classes for Philosophy,Photography,Archaeology and many others. There are two{Museums}in Kendal,Abbot Hall museum and the Natural History museum. The{Kendal {Gathering}is held in September. In it there is the County Show, the Torchlight Procession and quite a few charity events.The Torchlight Procession is when decorated lorries parade around the town with a famous person in the lead. There are 33{Pubs {and Hotels}in our area. Many young people go to pubs over the weekend as they haven't got anything else to do. The main social clubs are the John Boste, Queens, Netherfield and Liberal club. There are also the usual societies you would expect to find.
